properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 8 at 8:40PM MST until February 9 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Rapid City SD
properties.description:
A storm system will continue to bring snow to the region through
mid morning Sunday. Expect the heaviest snow over the northern
Black Hills where around 6 inches of total snow accumulation is
expected. Gusty northerly winds will lead to patchy blowing and
drifting snow, especially on the South Dakota plains.

* WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch.
Winds gusting as high as 35 mph.

* WHERE...Northern Campbell County.

* WHEN...Until 9 AM MST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing
snow could significantly reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

Road conditions are available on your smartphone from the
5 1 1 app for your state.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MST SUNDAY
